days.label: Monday
days.title: Rest Day
days.description: Rest and recovery don't need to be earned - they are a prerequisite for your performance

days.label: Wednesday
days.title: Tempo Run
options: Boost your speed endurance and get comfortable with faster paces 🏃‍♀️

days.label: Thursday
days.title: Rest Day
days.description: Rest. It's part of the plan 🛋️

days.label: Friday
days.title: Intervals
days.description: Run 5 intervals of 0.6 km at 5:45 min/km pace. Each interval is followed by 1:30 min rest at 7:00 min/km pace
options: Total distance: 4.1 km
Focus on maintaining good form during each interval ✨

days.label: Saturday
days.title: Long Run
options: Long runs are key to your marathon success 🚀

days.label: Sunday
days.title: Rest Day
days.description: Rest and recovery don't need to be earned - they are a prerequisite for your performance

PEAK.phaseDescription: Immediate preparation for the big race day.

days.label: Wednesday
days.title: Easy Run
days.description: Run 5 km at 7:00 min/km pace in the conditions/environment of the marathon
options: Keep it light and easy to stay fresh for the marathon

days.label: Friday
days.title: Yoga
days.description: Focus on recovery and mobility exercises
options: Enhance your flexibility and prevent injuries

days.label: Sunday
days.title: Marathon
days.description: Run 42.195 km at your marathon pace
options: This is it! Give it your all and enjoy the race

TAPER.phaseDescription: Ensuring you are healthy, not injured, and well-rested for the start line.
